content: {A歪头}<style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, can you hear that? A faint, restless, eager little sound.
info: NPC事件模板15-赠送种子-1013萨飞里_15-赠送种子

content: What could possibly make a sound like that...
info: NPC事件模板15-赠送种子-1013萨飞里_15-赠送种子

content: I picked these up on my last trip, but never got around to planting them. Now they're practically sprouting! Why don't you take them and plant them instead?
info: NPC事件模板15-赠送种子-1013萨飞里_15-赠送种子

content: {A抱歉}Ahem, the only thing I can keep alive is a cactus. These <style=Highlight>[noun:2,{种子包}]</style> are better off with you. I know you'll do great with them.
